name: Smooth Elevator
description:
How To Play

You are operating the only elevator on the building. 
You must carry as many passengers as possible to their deisred destinations.

Tap to go up

Press and hold to stop

Release to go down

Credits

Erdal Ural - Programming, Artwork

Umur Altürk - Programming, Audio

Font - https://www.dafont.com/gothic-pixel.font

Music - Local Forecast - Elevator Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
